scripts.reinstall: rimraf node_modules && npm cache clean && npm install
scripts.build:css:prod: node-sass _assets/sass/main.scss -x --output-style compressed | postcss -u autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' -u cssnano --no-map > static/css/main.css
scripts.build:critical:prod: critical public/index.html --inline --minify --base public > tmp/index.html && cp tmp/index.html public/index.html
scripts.prebuild:dev: npm run clean && npm run mkdirs
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:css:dev && npm run build:js:dev && npm run copy:images && npm run build:hugo:dev
scripts.prebuild:prod: npm run clean && npm run mkdirs
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:css:prod && npm run build:js:prod && npm run copy:images && npm run build:hugo:prod && npm run build:critical:prod
scripts.kill: lsof -n -i:8080 | grep LISTEN | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill -9
scripts.preserve: npm run build:dev && npm run kill
scripts.watch:css: onchange '_assets/**/*.scss' -- npm run build:css:dev && npm run build:hugo:dev
scripts.watch:js: onchange '_assets/**/*.js' -- npm run build:js:dev && npm run build:hugo:dev
scripts.watch:img: onchange '_assets/img/**/*.*' -- npm run copy:images && npm run build:hugo:dev
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:hugo' 'npm run watch:img'
